events.restart: echo "Get Cypress to re-run any open tests (after a short-delay) due to server file changes that may impact the test behavior (note that we aren't monitoring `node_modules` currently; also note that Cypress won't restart, if its plugin or fixture files are changed: https://github.com/cypress-io/cypress/issues/6606 )" && npm run rollup && delay 9 && touch cypress/support/index.js
